flowRoot.flowPara: Introduce the idea of TRIZ and identify an unwanted result
“Make a list of all you can do to make sure you achieve the worst possible results.”

“Ask yourselves: ‘Is there anything that we are currently doing that in any way, shape, or form resembles this item?’ Create a second list of all your counterproductive activities/programs/procedures.”
“What first steps will help you stop what you know creates undesirable results?”
